Key Match Events: Denzel Dumfries headed a late equaliser for the Netherlands to rescue a point in a 1-1 draw with Hungary.
Virgil van Dijk was sent off after receiving two yellow cards in the space of three minutes.
Roland Sallai scored for Hungary in the 32nd minute.
Cody Gakpo's free kick led to Dumfries' equalising goal.
Pre-Game Insights: Roland Sallai was an injury doubt before kick-off.
Post-Match Reflections: Denzel Dumfries praised the team for their fight and resilience.
Virgil van Dijk reflected on his yellow cards, stating he spoke to the referee in a respectful way.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary ended a run of nine straight defeats against the Netherlands.
The Netherlands had over 80 percent possession in the first half.
Germany leads the Group A3 table with seven points, followed by the Netherlands with five points.
